# Issue: Edit Tool

<Intro />

## Tool details
**Tool ID:** `portia:linear::edit_issue`

**Tool description:** 
        Edits an issue in Linear. This can edit 
        the title, the description, the assignee, the project,
        the team, the cycle, or combinations thereof. The user 
        must specify the identifier of the issue to be edited.
